actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 1 of H. Res. 1230. The next meeting is scheduled for 9:00 a.m. on December 30, 2022.
The Chair announced the extension, pursuant to section 3 of House Resolution 8, and effective December 26, 2022, of the "covered period" designated on January 4, 2021.

The House received a communication from William J. Walker, Sergeant at Arms. Pursuant to section 3(s) of House Resolution 8, following consultation with the Office of Attending Physician, Mr. Walker notified the House that the public health emergency due to the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 remains in effect.

actions-list.header: United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 1238(b)(3) of the Floyd D. Spence National Defense Authorization Act for fiscal year 2001(22 U.S.C. 7002), as amended, and the order of the House of January 4, 2021, the Speaker appointed Mr. Michael Wessel, Falls Church, VA and Ms. Reva B. Price, Chevy Chase, MD. Terms Expire Dec. 31, 2024.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 6 of H. Res. 1529, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Kweisi Mfume to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
